title: Deployment configuration for workload deployments
description: The schema for the deployment configuration file used for Climpr workloads

disabled.description: Setting this to true disables the deployment regardless of the triggering event.
Setting this to true disables the deployment when triggered from this specific triggering event.

name.description: The name of the deployment. This is the name in the 'Deployments' panel in the Azure portal.

location.description: The location for the deployment. This is optional has an organization default if not specified. This property is valid for Tenant, Management Group and Subscription scoped deployments.

resourceGroupName.description: The target Resource Group Name for the deployment. This property is only valid in Resource Group scoped deployments.

managementGroupId.description: The target Management Group Name for the deployment. This property is only valid in Management Group scoped deployments.
